template: [LANDSCAPE_ELEMENT], Early 20th Century Tonalist landscape study, rendered as a vintage Gum Bichromate photographic print, characterized by deep, velvety shadows and a limited, highly controlled analogous palette dominated by [PRIMARY_TONE]. Strong emphasis on sfumato and atmospheric perspective, achieving a profound sense of melancholic tranquility. [COMPOSITION_TYPE] vista captured using a large format view camera (8x10), shallow depth of field to isolate the central plane, fine grain structure visible upon close inspection, printed on heavy matte archival paper. [LIGHTING_CONDITION] illumination. Exhibition-quality archival print, immense tonal fidelity, subtle edge vignetting inherent to the historical printing process, masterwork rendering --ar [ASPECT_RATIO] --style raw

variable_explanations.LANDSCAPE_ELEMENT: Defines the core subject matter (e.g., 'Appalachian foothills shrouded in mist', 'A solitary cypress tree on the Tuscan hillside').
variable_explanations.COMPOSITION_TYPE: Determines the framing and arrangement (e.g., 'Symmetrical framing', 'Golden Ratio placement', 'Diagonal leading lines vista').
variable_explanations.LIGHTING_CONDITION: Crucial for Tonalism; controls mood and shadow definition (e.g., 'Contre-jour illumination', 'Overcast diffused light', 'Low side-lighting').
variable_explanations.PRIMARY_TONE: Controls the dominant monochromatic hue, essential for the Gum Bichromate look (e.g., 'Warm Sepia', 'Cool Prussian Blue', 'Neutral Carbon Black', 'Olive Green').

examples.prompt: Isolated Cypress Tree, Early 20th Century Tonalist landscape study, rendered as a vintage Gum Bichromate photographic print, characterized by deep, velvety shadows and a limited, highly controlled analogous palette dominated by Sepia Umber. Classic Centered vista captured using a large format view camera (8x10), shallow depth of field to isolate the central plane, fine grain structure visible upon close inspection, printed on heavy matte archival paper. Heavy Overcast illumination. Exhibition-quality archival print, immense tonal fidelity, subtle edge vignetting inherent to the historical printing process, masterwork rendering --ar 4:5 --style raw

checklist.detail: Implied by 'atmospheric perspective' and 'sfumato' and 'large format view camera'—the background should dissolve into tone.
'subtle edge vignetting inherent to the historical printing process' is specified.
'limited, highly controlled analogous palette dominated by [PRIMARY_TONE]' ensures tonal control.
The [COMPOSITION_TYPE] variable and 'large format view camera (8x10)' guide framing.
'fine grain structure visible upon close inspection' and 'immense tonal fidelity' calibrate detail focus toward texture and tone, not sharp edges.

checklist.item: Output format compatible with stated use cases?
checklist.detail: The use of '--ar [ASPECT_RATIO]' and '--style raw' ensures flexible, high-fidelity output appropriate for an 'archival print' aesthetic.

tips.guidance: For maximum historical authenticity, keep the palette (PRIMARY_TONE) close to browns, blues, or black. Avoid saturated or modern colors entirely. The 'sfumato' and 'atmospheric perspective' descriptors are key to achieving the desired Tonalist mood.

description: A professional-grade prompt template designed to generate images of vintage landscapes using the aesthetic principles of Early 20th Century Tonalism, specifically simulating the rich textural depth and subdued palette of a historical Gum Bichromate photographic print.
instructions: Replace the bracketed variables with your desired inputs. Use technical terms for maximum control over the output.

suggestions: Add style descriptor or use case

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: The title, 'Epic Cinematic Hero Portraits,' is flawless. It adheres strictly to the [Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type] pattern, uses strong visual and emotional language ('Epic,' 'Cinematic'), is perfectly sized (4 words), and clearly defines the output as a 'Portrait.' (20/20)
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: The template is highly optimized and robust. The variable `{subject}` is clearly marked for ease of use. The core style descriptors (volumetric lighting, cinematic color grading, epic atmosphere) constitute over 40% of the prompt, ensuring high stylistic consistency. Technical specifications (8k, photorealistic, Unreal Engine 5) are complete and professional. The template perfectly executes the promise of the title. (30/30)
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: While the existing 7 examples demonstrate good range across genres (sci-fi, fantasy), the package falls short of the required 8-10 count. More critically, the examples lean heavily toward specific character types. To maximize utility and demonstrate the prompt's flexibility, more abstract or conceptual variables are needed. (14/20)
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: The use cases identified (TTRPG tokens, concept art, book covers) are specific, high-value, and align perfectly with the output style. The combination of 'Cinematic' aesthetic and 'Unreal Engine' rendering technique establishes a strong, unique value proposition (UVP). The suggested mid-tier price ($4.99) is appropriate for this level of quality and utility. (15/15)
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: The description is functional but lacks polish. The hook ('Generate amazing, high-detail hero shots...') is adequate but not compelling enough to maximize marketplace clicks. Crucially, the description fails to explicitly list the powerful technical features (8k Resolution, Unreal Engine 5 implementation) that are present in the template. These features must be highlighted to justify the quality claim. Use cases are clearly specified. (11/15)

priority_improvements: Increase the number of variable examples from 7 to at least 10.
Introduce more abstract or categorical examples (e.g., 'The personification of time,' 'A sentient nebula').
Strengthen the description hook to be more action-oriented and exciting.
Explicitly list the key technical features (e.g., 'Utilizes 8k rendering and Unreal Engine 5 techniques') in the product description.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
This versatile prompt generates vintage landscape for any subject you can imagine.

✓ Fill-in-the-blank template for maximum flexibility
✓ Consistent style across all generations
✓ High-quality output ready for commercial use

Ideal for social media content, print-on-demand products, marketing materials, web design elements, and branding projects.

Perfect for designers, content creators, and anyone looking to create professional visuals quickly.
